plot: Lisa comes from Berlin to see her girlfriend, Mahfuze, for the weekend. Lisa does not know, however, that Mahfuze has something to tell her that will test the very boundaries of their long distance relationship.
title: L&M
plot_es: Lisa comes from Berlin to see her girlfriend, Mahfuze, for the weekend. Lisa does not know, however, that Mahfuze has something to tell her that will test the very boundaries of their long distance relationship.
